item.title: Becoming Instruments in the Hands of God
item.description:
Becoming Instruments in the Hands of God by Elder Don R. Clarke, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 176th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2006
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Don R. Clarke, Of the Seventy

item.title: Blessings of the Sacrament
item.description:
